channel.title: How can i make certain items unspawnable on a 517 server
channel.description:
hi,
I want to make some items unspawnable on my 517 server, but when I try it in player.java and then search "economyitems" and when I add the item ID's and use my compiler I get no errors, but those items are still spawnable .
how can I fix that?
thank you,
startcode

item.title: How can i make certain items unspawnable on a 517 server
item.dc:creator: @startcode startcode
item.description:
@startcode wrote:

tysm it worked but if i want to make more items unspawnable can i just at the ids in the same place? (ITEMIDHERE)?

Read full topic
item.source: How can i make certain items unspawnable on a 517 server

item.title: How can i make certain items unspawnable on a 517 server
item.dc:creator: @i_pk_girls i pk girls
item.description:
@i_pk_girls wrote:

Search if (cmd[0].equalsIgnoreCase("item")) { in commands.java
and under if (p.wildernessZone(p.absX, p.absY)) { p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, "You cannot spawn items while inside of the wilderness."); return; }
Add if ((itemID == IDOFITEM)) { p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, "This item cannot be spawned."); p.getActionSender().addSoundEffect(p, 4039, 1, 0, 0); return; }
Hope this helps

Read full topic
